nodes.description: 周五，奎达发生了一起造成20人死亡的自杀式爆炸袭击。
nodes.support_text: The community had been protesting for the last four days against the bombing, which had claimed 20 lives in Quetta on Friday.

nodes.description: 哈扎拉社区为抗议爆炸案开始了为期四天的静坐。
nodes.support_text: Members of the Shia Hazara community, protesting against the Hazarganji suicide bombing, ended their sit-in late on Monday night after receiving assurances from Balochistan Chief Minister Jam Kamal Alyani and State Minister for Interior, Sheharyar Afridi.

nodes.description: 抗议者拒绝了地方政府和省级部长要求结束静坐的请求。
nodes.support_text: The protesters had earlier refused to call off the sit-in despite repeated requests by the district administration and appeals of provincial ministers, including Balochistan Home Minister Mir Ziaullah Langove, health minister Naseebullah Marri and others.

nodes.description: 周一，联邦部长谢赫里亚尔·阿夫里迪抵达奎达评估安全局势。
nodes.support_text: PTI leaders Sheharyar Afridi and Zulfiqar Bukhari arrived in Quetta on Monday.

nodes.description: 阿夫里迪部长访问了伊玛目巴拉赫并向遇难者家属表示哀悼。
nodes.support_text: Afridi had visited the Imam Bargah located in Hazara town to condole with the bereaved family members.

nodes.description: 联邦部长与俾路支省首席部长会面，讨论如何结束抗议。
nodes.support_text: Afridi and Bukhari also called on the Balochistan chief minister and other political leaders to discuss the means to improve security and end the ongoing protest by Hazara community.

nodes.description: 首席部长阿利亚尼发誓要将恐怖袭击的肇事者绳之以法
nodes.support_text: 首席部长阿利亚尼发誓要将恐怖袭击的肇事者绳之以法

edges.support_text: Members of the Shia Hazara community, protesting against the Hazarganji suicide bombing, ended their sit-in late on Monday night after receiving assurances from Balochistan Chief Minister Jam Kamal Alyani and State Minister for Interior, Sheharyar Afridi.

The protesters had earlier refused to call off the sit-in despite repeated requests by the district administration and appeals of provincial ministers, including Balochistan Home Minister Mir Ziaullah Langove, health minister Naseebullah Marri and others.
Afridi had visited the Imam Bargah located in Hazara town to condole with the bereaved family members.
Afridi and Bukhari also called on the Balochistan chief minister and other political leaders to discuss the means to improve security and end the ongoing protest by Hazara community.
